name: Measure
tagline: Track your real ROI—spiritual and material.
reflectionPrompt: Where is money leaking—and what emotion is behind it?
majorMove: Do a 15-min review: list last 7 days spend + 1 insight.

name: Think
reflectionPrompt: What belief about wealth is limiting me right now?
majorMove: Rewrite 3 limiting beliefs into ownership beliefs; read them aloud.

name: Feel
reflectionPrompt: What money moment still makes me tense—and why?
majorMove: Before next purchase: pause 30s, name emotion, then decide.

name: Speak
reflectionPrompt: What do I keep saying that becomes true?
majorMove: Write one money declaration; place it where you’ll see it daily.

name: Ask
reflectionPrompt: What do I want specifically—and what fear blocks the ask?
majorMove: Make one clear ask today (client, mentor, partner, discount, collab).

name: Hold
reflectionPrompt: What does “being the bank” look like this month?
majorMove: Automate a weekly transfer into savings (even tiny).

name: Use
reflectionPrompt: Which expense could become an investment instead?
majorMove: Redirect one spending category into skill/tool/asset this week.

name: Manifest
reflectionPrompt: Who must I become to hold what I’m asking for?
majorMove: Write 5 traits of Future You; act on 1 trait today.

name: Attract
tagline: Magnetize wealth through value and trust.
reflectionPrompt: Where can I create obvious value this week?
majorMove: Ship one small value item today (tip, post, template, outreach).

name: Enjoy
reflectionPrompt: Do I allow myself to enjoy money without shame?
majorMove: Plan 1 joyful spend + 1 intentional give this week.
